items.headline: Oracle is getting two new CEOs. What does that mean for the stock?
items.summary_en: With Safra Catz staying involved at Oracle in the role of executive vice chair, investors can expect “a smooth transition” as Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia jointly assume the CEO position.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Brain drain? How Wall Street is reacting to $100,000 charge for H-1B visas
items.summary_en: New Trump administration rules that will require a $100,000 fee for a type of visa used extensively in the technology industry brought fears of an exodus of talent that will sap the potential for growth.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: The small-business hiring engine is sputtering. That’s a red flag for the economy.
items.summary_en: Without small businesses and their hiring, already precarious economic growth could be prone to a pullback.

items.headline: I’m 88 and leaving my $450,000 estate to my son because he has children. Is that wrong?
